content: sts work open work pattern for 4 row work 2 row stocking stitch ending creating 2 stripes with a purl row front torso change to stocking stitch commence open work pattern work 2 row cast o� 4 sts at the beginning of the k1 *work 1 long sts in next stitch next 2 row 34 40 44 48 52 56 sts repeat from * to end of row work in stocking stitch for purl 1 row dropping extra wraps as you 8 8 8 5 8 5 9 9 making sure you come to them work the same number of row as for the back torso ending with a knit row repeat these 2 row twice more for a decrease for front rib p2 1 3 1 2 4 total of 6 row creating 3 stripes p2tog * p1 2 2 3 3 3 p2tog repeat from * 8 times more p to end neck opening 24 30 34 38 42 46 sts sl 1 knit to end for 3 row rib k1 p1 rib for 4 cast o� sl1 k15 18 19 21 22 24 co 10 10 12 12 14 14 sts for neck k16 19 20 22 23 25 2 retro claude tea rose slip on to make up block according to schematic page 4 sew up side and underarm seams a ribbon or cord can be run through the neckline to gather it up if desired sleeves with right side of sweater facing pick up and knit 24 26 28 30 32 34 sts across the drop stitch and garter stitch edge of the yoke purl 1 row work openwork pattern for 6 row creating 3 stripes decrease for rib sizes s m l k1 2 3 * k2tog k1 repeat from * 7 times more k to end 16 18 20 sts sizes xl 2xl 3xl k 1 2 3 * k2tog k2 repeat from * 7 times more k to end 22 24 26 sts work 3 row in k1 p1 rib cast o� repeat for other sleeve 3 retro claude tea rose slip on finished garment measurements a 15 125 17 75 19 5 21 25 23 125 24 875 b 8 8 8 5 8 5 9 9 c 4 4 4 4 4 4 d 6 125 6 5 6 825 7 125 7 5 7 825 e 4 5 4 5 5 25 5 25 6 25 6 25 f 18 625 21 25 23 125 24 825 26 625 28 5 g 7 125 8 8 825 9 75 10 625 11 5 4
